segments.text: Do you remember Tina , my good friend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She just broke up with her boyfriend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , that happens . I hope she is all right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the problem is she and her ex-boyfriend are working in the same department . It is somehow embarrassing for them to see each other everyday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is the down side of an office romance . I hope their work is not affected by the emotional stress . The boss must be very annoyed if that will be the case .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , Tina says she would be able to handle it and concentrate on her own work , easier set them done . But working harder and concentrating only on the job might well helped to overcome the initial stress of the breakup .
segments.speaker: S1
